data.name: Name for sensor and events
data.topic: Topic at MQTT-server with Sleep As Android events. Must be same as in application settings
data.root_topic: Topic at MQTT-server with Sleep As Android subtopics. All subtopics will be created as independent devices. Must be consistent with application settings
